700755f-a.text:
City Island Avenue (City Island), at the S. W. corner of Buckley Street, showing an Italian sea food restaurant. The view is north from Buckley Street.
July 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
700755f-a.folder: City Island Avenue & Buckley Street, Bronx, NY
700755f-a.original_title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Buckley Street

700724f-a.text:
Buckley Street (City Island), south side, west from but not including
City Island Ave.
July 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
700724f-a.folder: Buckley Street & City Island Avenue, Bronx, NY
700724f-a.original_title: Bronx: Buckley Street - City Island Avenue
